scripts.start: concurrently --names 'parser  ',prettier 'npm run -w parser start' 'npm run -w prettier start'
scripts.prepare: npm run clean --workspaces && npm run build --workspaces
scripts.build:watch: concurrently --names 'parser  ',prettier 'npm run -w parser build:watch' 'npm run -w prettier build:watch'
scripts.npm:publish-beta: npm run prepare && npm publish . --tag beta
scripts.npm:publish-latest: npm run prepare && npm publish . --tag latest
